title: Club owner not in club
body:
So, on this account I have the club "Riven Mains" with the tag "RIVEN". This account is the owner of the club since I was on this account when clubs opened up, but I use the tag on a different account.

I wanted to start leveling this account and use the tag here too, but the client (Legacy and Beta) both show that this account isn't in any clubs when I log in on it. This account still shows as owner to other people in the club though.

This kind of sucks, because I can't use the tag on this account and I can't invite people to the club. Any tips?
